text: Arra ga kare ni oken o sadzuke rareta koto kara,(koman ni natte) omoni tsuite iburahimu to rongi shita mono o, anata wa shiranakatta no ka. Iburahimu ga,`watashi no omo wa,-sei o sazuke mata shi o tamau katada.' To itta toki, kare wa `watashi mo,-sei o sazuke mata shi o ataeru.' To itta. Iburahimu wa itta. `Arra wa, taiyo o azuma kara nobora se rareru. Sorede anata wa, sore o nishi kara nobora se nasai.' Sokode kano fushin-sha wa towaku shite shimatta. Arra wa fugi o okonau min o onmichibiki ni nara renai
